GSD.product_version: versions from v5.12 to before v5.19.2
GSD.description:
PCI: microchip: Fix refcount leak in mc_pcie_init_irq_domains()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.2 by commit 880ece912b958a0c92cc0baa8e906fb9b49a4b53, it was introduced in version v5.12 by commit 6f15a9c9f94133bee0d861a4bf25e10aaa95219d. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: PCI: microchip: Fix refcount leak in mc_pcie_init_irq_domains()
